tables.name: LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest
tables.description: A LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest is a request to change the borrower of a loan contract immediately.

columns.name: UUID
columns.description: UUID is an universal unique identifier of a loan contract borrower party change request. Example: 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef

columns.name: ID
columns.description: ID is an identifier of a loan contract borrower party change request. Example: 47938

columns.name: LoanContractUUID
columns.description: An internal ID of Loan Contract. Example: 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef

columns.name: LifeCycleStatusCode
columns.description: LifeCycleStatusCode is the coded representation of the life cycle status of a loan contract borrower party change request. Example: 3

columns.name: LifeCycleStatusName
columns.description: Name of a LifeCycleStatusCode. Example: Completed

columns.name: ReasonCode
columns.description: ReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the loan contract borrower party change request. Example: 1

columns.name: ReasonName
columns.description: Is the name of the reason code Example: Change of legal  form

columns.name: BusinessProcessChainAssignment
columns.description: BusinessProcessChainAssignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.

columns.name: NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements
columns.description: NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements is a party that legally holds a bank account associated with the loan contract after completion of the borrower party change request.

columns.name: FormerBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements
columns.description: FormerBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements is a party that legally holds a bank account associated with the loan contract before completion of the borrower party change request.

columns.name: NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID
columns.description: NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract. Example: 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef

columns.name: ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator
columns.description: ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator indicates whether a charge for activation of a loan contract borrower party change request is requested to be waived or not.

columns.name: CompletionDate
columns.description: The CompletionDate is the date on which a loan contract borrower party change request is completed. Example: 2017-04-13
